title: Holi-Crazed: A collection of funny holiday short stories from Author Elle Marlow
description: You will laugh, you will cry. You won't believe anything you're about to read. If you loved Erma Bombeck, you'll enjoy Elle Marlow's stories of her own family holiday mayhem. This is a holiday short story collection that puts the fun in dysfunctional. There are five short stories for you to enjoy. Turkey in the Streets Oh Christmas Tree, Oh Christmas tree, how I'll go to jail for thee Halloween, Headaches and Hallways Easter with my pregnant kid Birthday, Wedding Rings and Hamsters. Pick your favorite, argue with your friends which one is the funnier, and realize your own family isn't half as crazy as you think. These stories are for adults due to some foul language and questionable morals and some pretty shady parenting.
author: Elle Marlow
